txt.en: Orcs of Mordor dwelling in the caverns below the mountains are up to many nefarious activities.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time-limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
'You have succeeded have you? Nothing rattles the enemy quite so much as the loss of their leader!'
Candúr has asked you to investigate the Skoironk and find a way to discourage the invaders from remaining there.

'We must strike the enemies within Skoironk. Their leader, a vile Orc known as Thrugash, was recently seen entering the caverns. With his demise, we may just obtain the upper hand here.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to Candúr and apprise him of your efforts.
